With no killing-time game NO.1 mistake!! In fact ... What is broken down is not only a block. Up to a block, a wooden board, brick, a wooden box, a drum, an oil can, a chair, a table, a tire, a vending machine, what, and a motorbike. Anything is broken!! The realistic motion by the physical operation of a Doppelganger Inc. no one but is living. Further!! The production which the BASH BLOCK cannot consider is a large number!! "Do balls increase in number to two pieces??" It can say and say. -- "Are they three pieces??" It can say and say. -- "Are they four pieces???" It can say and say. -- "Are they five pieces!!! !" He does not say and remember!! Anyhow, it is full!! "Does a ball also double large??" It can say and say. -- "-- obtaining -- by no means -- Also this -- ??" Yes, it does not understand!! It becomes very large!!! If it does, it understands!!

reviews.title: Miaou
reviews.comment: This is awesome!!!  A totally new take on breaker games!!!! Jamie - you are an idiot. This is not better than breaker 3 only because that is a huge game. Also - READ THE DESCRIPTION!!!  LOLOL!!!!!! I am guessing it is a very poor translation. I want to learn  Japanese
